rule.title: Properties checker
rule.descr: Checks the title and other basic properties of the learning objects (like theme and so on)

error.message: The title of the LO must start with the number of the module (e.g., "1. Name")
The title of the LO must start with the number of the module (e.g., "1. Name")
The size of the learning object has to be 14
The navigation type has to be historic
The theme has to be "flat blue"
The title of every title slide has to be "Titolo"

warning.message: The title should not containt numbers.
